projects: [{"title":"Text and Graphic Separation for an OCR","start_date":"Feb 2014","description":"The project aims at developing the system which could take a page of text book as input, identify and separate the text and non-text regions from it. Non-text region include graphics like image and table. Project helped to increase efficiency of OCR.Technology Used: OpenCV (Visual Studio), C++.Role: Front end design and programming."},{},{},{"title":"Hindi Spell Corrector","start_date":"Sep 2013","description":"The project aims at developing the system which could take a Hindi word as an input, correcting the typographical errors and providing closest correct word with few suggestions.Technology Used: Java (Netbeans) [Applets].Efficiency: 85% (Tested on 7000+ words).Role: Front end design and programming."},{},{},{"title":"Budget Approval System","start_date":"Feb 2013","description":"Project aims at providing an interface to an employee in an organisation to request and approve the financial transactions.Technology Used: Java (Netbeans), Database and OOM Concepts [Applets, Swing, JDBC].Role: Programming and GUI implementation."}]
